General.Name: Touchstar plc
General.Description: Touchstar plc, together with its subsidiaries, designs and builds rugged mobile computing devices under the Touchstar brand in the United Kingdom and rest of Europe. It also supplies, installs, and maintains software applications and hardware solutions for mobile applications in the transport, logistics, and access control industries. In addition, the company offers supply chain data capture solutions; GPS satellite tracking and vehicle telematics data; software and hardware for the oil and gas logistics sector; products for security checking clearance and recording attendance; and PODStar, an EPOD solution for SMEs and other organizations. The company was formerly known as Belgravium Technologies plc and changed its name to Touchstar plc in May 2016. Touchstar plc was incorporated in 1904 and is headquartered in Manchester, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 7 Commerce Way, Manchester, United Kingdom, M17 1HW
